text:
Matt Hancock has just mislead the nation by saying the R number is falling and therefore, England can move to level 3 on the Coronavirus Warning Scale.

SAGE today have said the R rate increased to between 0.7 and 1.

They're lying to you all and nobody is batting an eyelid.
